segments.text: I'd like to book a room , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will you be staying , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of room do you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A single room with a bath , if possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A single room with a front view is 100 dollars per night , one with a rear is 80 dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll take a front one.My name is John Brown . J-O-H-N B-R-O-W-N .
segments.speaker: S2
